name: CircleofProductDesign
0:
”Alexa, open Circle of Product Design.”
”Alexa, start Circle of Product Design.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: circle of product design
des:
The product design process is a circle made up of 9 steps. Alexa explains each and every one of the steps. Follow these steps and you become a master in product design.
Graphics by Francesca Negro.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
